MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW8 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Station Road, Bag Lane, Warrington Road, Hefferston Rise and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:00PM due to emergency repairs required. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 6:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:22PM on 29th March 2021.
